title: "Themes"

```{r}
#| include: false
library(webforest)
```

Theme functions for customizing forest plot appearance.

## Preset Themes

### web_theme_default {#web_theme_default}

Clean, modern default theme with subtle colors.
```r
web_theme_default()
```

### web_theme_jama {#web_theme_jama}

JAMA journal style: black & white, compact, sans-serif fonts.

```r
web_theme_jama()
```

### web_theme_lancet {#web_theme_lancet}

Lancet journal style: navy blue accents, serif fonts.

```r
web_theme_lancet()
```

### web_theme_modern {#web_theme_modern}

Contemporary UI with subtle colors and modern typography.

```r
web_theme_modern()
```

### web_theme_presentation {#web_theme_presentation}

Large fonts optimized for slides and presentations.

```r
web_theme_presentation()
```

### web_theme_dark {#web_theme_dark}

Dark mode with light text on dark background.

```r
web_theme_dark()
```

### web_theme_minimal {#web_theme_minimal}

Minimal black & white styling.

```r
web_theme_minimal()
```

## Theme Modifiers

All modifiers return the modified theme and can be chained with pipes.

### set_theme {#set_theme}

Set or change theme on a WebSpec or widget. Accepts theme name or object.
```r
set_theme(x, theme)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `x` | WebSpec object or htmlwidget |
| `theme` | Theme name string or WebTheme object |

**Available theme names**: `"default"`, `"minimal"`, `"dark"`, `"jama"`, `"lancet"`, `"modern"`, `"presentation"`, `"cochrane"`, `"nature"`

**Examples**:
```r
# Using theme name
forest_plot(data, ...) |> set_theme("jama")

# Using theme object
forest_plot(data, ...) |> set_theme(web_theme_lancet())
```

### set_colors {#set_colors}

Customize theme colors.

```r
set_colors(
  theme,
  background = NULL,
  foreground = NULL,
  primary = NULL,
  secondary = NULL,
  accent = NULL,
  muted = NULL,
  border = NULL,
  interval_positive = NULL,
  interval_negative = NULL,
  interval_neutral = NULL,
  interval_line = NULL,
  summary_fill = NULL,
  summary_border = NULL
)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `background` | Background color |
| `foreground` | Primary text color |
| `primary` | Primary accent color |
| `secondary` | Secondary text color |
| `accent` | Accent color |
| `muted` | Muted text color |
| `border` | Border color |
| `interval_positive` | Color for favorable effects |
| `interval_negative` | Color for unfavorable effects |
| `interval_neutral` | Color for neutral effects |
| `interval_line` | Interval line color |
| `summary_fill` | Summary diamond fill |
| `summary_border` | Summary diamond border |

### set_typography {#set_typography}

Customize fonts and text styling.

```r
set_typography(
  theme,
  font_family = NULL,
  font_size_sm = NULL,
  font_size_base = NULL,
  font_size_lg = NULL,
  font_weight_normal = NULL,
  font_weight_medium = NULL,
  font_weight_bold = NULL,
  line_height = NULL
)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `font_family` | CSS font-family string |
| `font_size_sm` | Small text (e.g., `"0.75rem"`) |
| `font_size_base` | Base text (e.g., `"0.875rem"`) |
| `font_size_lg` | Large text (e.g., `"1rem"`) |
| `font_weight_normal` | Normal weight (e.g., 400) |
| `font_weight_medium` | Medium weight (e.g., 500) |
| `font_weight_bold` | Bold weight (e.g., 600) |
| `line_height` | Line height multiplier |

### set_spacing {#set_spacing}

Customize spacing and sizing.

```r
set_spacing(
  theme,
  row_height = NULL,
  header_height = NULL,
  section_gap = NULL,
  padding = NULL,
  cell_padding_x = NULL,
  cell_padding_y = NULL
)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `row_height` | Data row height in pixels |
| `header_height` | Header row height in pixels |
| `section_gap` | Gap between sections |
| `padding` | Container padding |
| `cell_padding_x` | Horizontal cell padding |
| `cell_padding_y` | Vertical cell padding |

### set_shapes {#set_shapes}

Customize shapes and visual elements.

```r
set_shapes(
  theme,
  point_size = NULL,
  summary_height = NULL,
  line_width = NULL,
  border_radius = NULL,
  marker_colors = NULL,
  marker_shapes = NULL
)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `point_size` | Point marker radius |
| `summary_height` | Summary diamond height |
| `line_width` | Interval line width |
| `border_radius` | Border radius for containers |
| `marker_colors` | Vector of colors for multi-effect plots |
| `marker_shapes` | Vector of shapes for multi-effect plots |

### set_marker_colors {#set_marker_colors}

Set default marker colors for multi-effect plots.

```r
set_marker_colors(theme, colors)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `theme` | WebTheme object |
| `colors` | Character vector of CSS colors |

**Example**:
```r
web_theme_default() |>
  set_marker_colors(c("#2563eb", "#dc2626", "#16a34a"))
```

### set_marker_shapes {#set_marker_shapes}

Set default marker shapes for multi-effect plots.

```r
set_marker_shapes(theme, shapes)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `theme` | WebTheme object |
| `shapes` | Character vector: `"square"`, `"circle"`, `"diamond"`, `"triangle"` |

**Example**:
```r
web_theme_default() |>
  set_marker_shapes(c("square", "circle", "diamond"))
```

### set_axis {#set_axis}

Customize axis appearance.

```r
set_axis(
  theme,
  range_min = NULL,
  range_max = NULL,
  tick_count = NULL,
  tick_values = NULL,
  gridlines = NULL,
  gridline_style = NULL
)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `range_min` | Minimum axis value (NULL = auto) |
| `range_max` | Maximum axis value (NULL = auto) |
| `tick_count` | Target number of ticks |
| `tick_values` | Explicit tick positions (numeric vector) |
| `gridlines` | Show gridlines (TRUE/FALSE) |
| `gridline_style` | `"solid"`, `"dashed"`, or `"dotted"` |

### set_layout {#set_layout}

Customize layout options.

```r
set_layout(
  theme,
  plot_position = NULL,
  table_width = NULL,
  plot_width = NULL,
  row_border = NULL,
  row_border_style = NULL,
  container_border = NULL,
  container_border_radius = NULL
)
```

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `plot_position` | `"left"` or `"right"` |
| `table_width` | Table width (`"auto"` or pixels) |
| `plot_width` | Plot width (`"auto"` or pixels) |
| `row_border` | Show row borders (TRUE/FALSE) |
| `row_border_style` | `"solid"`, `"dashed"`, `"dotted"` |
| `container_border` | Show container border (TRUE/FALSE) |
| `container_border_radius` | Container border radius |

## Examples

### Chaining Modifiers

```{r}
#| eval: false
web_theme_jama() |>
  set_colors(primary = "#0066cc") |>
  set_typography(font_family = "Georgia, serif") |>
  set_spacing(row_height = 28) |>
  set_axis(gridlines = TRUE)
```

### Custom Theme for Publication

```{r}
#| eval: false
publication_theme <- web_theme_minimal() |>
  set_colors(
    foreground = "#1a1a1a",
    interval_line = "#333333"
  ) |>
  set_typography(
    font_family = "Times New Roman, serif",
    font_size_base = "11pt"
  ) |>
  set_spacing(row_height = 24) |>
  set_axis(gridlines = FALSE)
```
